Sandman Cometh: It's become such a classic that Adam Sandler has updated it several times, with fresh examples of James Caan celebs swapped in for each new version. But the original still holds up as a gem: David Lee Roth , lights the menorah/So do Kirk Douglas , James Caan and the late Dinah Shore-a!/ Guess who eats together at the Carnegie Deli?/ Bowser from Sha Na Na and Arthur Fonzarelli!/ Paul Newman 's half James Caan and Goldie Hawn 's half, too/Put them together: What a fine-looking Jew! were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room when she opened her eyes were three of her close female friends in Congress: House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi of California, Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. The doctors couldn't believe it, Debbie Wasserman Schultz later told CNN. "It was the most incredible experience that I have ever had." Gabrielle Giffords is expected to survive, although her condition and the extent of her recovery remain in doubt.
